commits.author: Jason van Zyl
commits.sourceNew:
/** Prints a query to a string, with field as the default field for terms.

The representation used is one that is readable by QueryParser (although, if the query was created by the parser, the printed representation may not be exactly what was parsed). */ abstract public String toString(String field);

commits.author: Otis Gospodnetic

The representation used is one that is readable by QueryParser (although, if the query was created by the parser, the printed representation may not be exactly what was parsed). */ abstract public String toString(String field);

commits.author: Otis Gospodnetic
Doug Cutting
commits.sourceNew:
/** Prints a query to a string, with field as the default field * for terms.

The representation used is one that is readable by {@link * org.apache.lucene.queryParser.QueryParser QueryParser} (although, if the * query was created by the parser, the printed representation may not be * exactly what was parsed). */ public abstract String toString(String field);

commits.author: Erik Hatcher
commits.sourceOld:
/** Prints a query to a string, with field as the default field * for terms.

The representation used is one that is readable by {@link * org.apache.lucene.queryParser.QueryParser QueryParser} (although, if the * query was created by the parser, the printed representation may not be * exactly what was parsed). */ public abstract String toString(String field);

commits.author: Daniel Naber
commits.sourceNew:
/** Prints a query to a string, with field as the default field * for terms.

The representation used is one that is supposed to be readable * by {@link org.apache.lucene.queryParser.QueryParser QueryParser}. However, * there are the following limitations: *

    *
  • If the query was created by the parser, the printed * representation may not be exactly what was parsed. For example, * characters that need to be escaped will be represented without * the required backslash.
    • *
  • Some of the more complicated queries (e.g. span queries) * don't have a representation that can be parsed by QueryParser.
    • *
*/ public abstract String toString(String field);

commits.author: Daniel Naber
commits.sourceNew:
/** Prints a query to a string, with field assumed to be the * default field and ommitted. *

The representation used is one that is supposed to be readable * by {@link org.apache.lucene.queryParser.QueryParser QueryParser}. However, * there are the following limitations: *

    *
  • If the query was created by the parser, the printed * representation may not be exactly what was parsed. For example, * characters that need to be escaped will be represented without * the required backslash.
    • *
  • Some of the more complicated queries (e.g. span queries) * don't have a representation that can be parsed by QueryParser.
    • *
*/ public abstract String toString(String field);
